name: Glyph Casters
description:
Take the role of a wizard and duel against your friends or enemies by invoking our ancient glyph spells.

HOW TO INVOKE THEM, YOU ASK?

- DRAW THEIR SYMBOLS on the scroll of mythical enlightenment!

Details

Online turn-based combat game between two players. The player who's health reaches zero, loses. And don't forget to constraint your mana! Figure out which spell fits the best scenario.

Step by Step guide:

1. Select the class type at the bottom of the screen.

2. Check your spell book, learn the spells, draw which ever you want!

3. Take your opponent down!

Good luck and have fun!
